firstReading.title: First Reading
firstReading.text: For I, the Lord your God, hold your right hand; it is I who say to you, 'Fear not, I will help you.'

psalm.title: Responsorial Psalm
psalm.response: The Lord is gracious and merciful.

gospel.title: Gospel
gospel.text: Jesus said to the crowds, 'Amen, I say to you, among those born of women there has been none greater than John the Baptist.'
